Text: How do you use this? It only has a .dll, and I have no idea what to do with it.
go to your programs directory and locate the same .dll file using the search bar. Replace, make sure photoshop or any of the adobe software are closed when you do this. reopen and enjoy.

it is not working for encore...

replaced the .dll file and got an error message saying "Adobe Encore CS6 can not run in non-royalty serialised mode. the application needs to beserialized with a royalty bearing serial number".

how to get a royalty bearing serial number, please?...

cheers,
